# Donate

If you’d like to directly support my work, you can donate through any of the
following platforms:

- **GitHub Sponsors:** https://github.com/sponsors/RickCreator87  
- **Buy Me a Coffee:** https://www.buymeacoffee.com/rickcreator87  

Every contribution — big or small — helps me continue building high‑quality,
open‑source infrastructure for the GitDigital ecosystem.
